 Raw input:
  HB 0. 4  0
  "act288m" f 1 2
  4  22 24 26

  Reliability of scores:       0.0
  True-score Beta model:       4-parameter Beta distribution
  Model-fit testing:           Minimum expected value of bins set to 0.0
  Name of data file:           "act288m"

   - Score-frequency column:   2

  Maximum possible score:      40 (Inferred from data)
  Number of categories:        4

  True-score cut-point(s):     0.55, 0.6, 0.65
